name: Jared Pittenger
text: Family owned business that puts the customers first. They do any and everything they possibly can to make sure every experience is better than the last

name: Terrance Jacobs
text: Great place to work we family.

resp.text: Thanks!  You're an awesome employee, thank you for all your hard work!

name: Jenn Lewis
text: Hardworking group of guys!

name: Brighton Bears1977
text: Very clean & organized & very friendly

name: Roger Head
text: Not a good place to work.

name: April Chassee
text: I tried a sample of this blend and it was amazing I bought a can on the spot lol. I really like that I don't have to add a natural sweetener to my fig brew coffee and I can enjoy as is! Will be back and will also bring home more as well. Customer service is also top notch!

name: omkar kulkarni
text: Look no further if you want a coffee alternative ! Fig brew can be easily used in Keurig and actually brews more amount than typical spoonful of coffee powder. I add non-dairy milk creamer in it. Tastes delicious !!

name: Russ Edwards
text: FigBrew makes an excellent coffee alternative! We bought the Figgee. To me it has a sweet taste without the bitterness of coffee - simply delicious. I highly recommend this product!

name: Ashai Adams
text: A lovely brew, smooth and great without cream. Truly will give up regular coffee for figbrew. I can’t wait to tell my friends.

name: Brandon B
text: I just had figbrew today for the first time and was quite surprised. It is interesting because It didn't have a pungent smell like coffee does but that did not discount the taste. I thoroughly enjoyed it and the amazing thing is as the brew cooled off the taste got better.

name: Remelus Bowden
text:
Fig Brew as the name suggest isn't coffee and definitely not tea but a tasty and way more healthier alternative to both. The location is not a drop in typical coffee shop but a more personable engulfing experience in the ways of fig brews hot and cold alike.
Stop in check it out pick up some and take it home.

name: Time for Tea
text: I searched for a coffee alternative for quite some time. Some were good, but didn’t come very close to the coffee taste that I missed. Then I found Figbrew and my world has changed forever! Rest easy. For your search for a delicious coffee alternative ends here. The taste is so rich and flavorful, you won’t even miss coffee.

name: Jackie Brown
text: I was told by my drs no caffeine. I love a good cup of coffee in the morning but that is out of the question now. Or so I thought. This stuff is wonderful. Coffee with a hint of fig and my heart doesn’t race. The people there are super. Very helpful and friendly. I highly recommend this product. Fig Brew is an answered prayer. Thank you

name: Lara Vandiver
text: Stopped by fig brew not knowing exactly what it was.  They were so kind and made me a figgie latte.  It was so good.  The acid in regular coffee bothers my stomach so I’m really excited to try this!  Thank you!

name: Alex Ura
text: Wow! This coffee alternative is amazing. The best that we have ever tried. We are definitely going to order more once we are done with this first order. :-)

name: Mario Perez
text: Different but very good alternative for coffe. My wife loves it specially since it's organic and zero calories.  I highly recommend it.

name: Morgan Vick
text: There is something special about enjoying a warm drink on a cold morning. I have struggled with coffee jitters ever since my collge days. FigBrew is the perfect alternative! Fair trade, organic, AND recycable packaging?? You can't ask for more. Try FigBrew, thank me later!

name: Adedeji Odofin
text: I love the smoothness of figbrew! Quality product and great taste!

name: Jonathan Dunwoody
text: I was skeptical of this but it is very tasty!

name: Kathy Wagner
text: Love FigBrew, I drink it everyday.

name: Mark Rivera
text:
No overnight parking don’t come too early starts to checkin 0700 don’t follow goggle map my load shifted due to the one uphill sharp turn on OXMOOR CiR by the bank take the oxmoor lane at BARBER COURT less sharper turn

Make sure load don’t shift or contact D&V express talk to david gave us better prices than church transport and did it immediately  made my cutoff appointment and

name: Keith Cooper
text: Very neat and tidy warehouse

name: Kionne Johnson
text: Sssssssssssllllllllllllllooooooooooooowwwwwwwwwwwwww

name: Dean White
text: I work here so I can not tell you anything but I have not missed a paycheck for 26 years

name: Frederick Blackmon
text:
I had to deliver to this place ,there is no tractor trailer parking & no place to park close by , they don't start till 7am & you can't come on property until 7am also if you have air bags securing your load they leave them in your trailer and you can't throw them away on their property even though you get them from one of their plants & it's their trash
I WILL NOT DELIVER TO TO PLACE AGAIN & NOT BUYING PEPSI ANYMORE

name: Wiseone
text: Treats employees that have been there like they are trash. Long time employees should be treated better. If you have a CDL, don't work here. I don't know what idiot is making decisions for the sales department,  but they should be replaced. The owner should value the employees,  the past owner did.

name: Lorenzo Jones
text: Excellent place to work

name: Melvin Hill
text: Great people ,very charitable

name: Nia Richardson
text: Roxxy on the Rocks was ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!! I booked them for my wedding of about 150 people, and they kept the drinks flowing. They made me and my husband both signature cocktails based on the type of tastes we liked and they made sure it fit with the theme of the wedding. From the very beginning, they were very professional and the communication was great. Booking was easy and the price fit my budget. I enjoyed every moment planning my big day with Roxxy on the Rocks and on my wedding day, everyone mentioned how great the drinks were. I provided the alcohol and they took care of the rest. I will definitely hire them for another event.

resp.text: We really appreciate your trust in us for your big day! You were absolutely stunning and made our job pleasant and so enjoyable. Thank you and congratulations again!

name: Fi Plan Partners
text: Roxxy on the Rocks and her team did an incredible job.  They were there early to make sure everything was set up how we wanted.  Roxxy also stayed in contact before the event to make sure we had exactly what we needed.  I would highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We really enjoyed serving you and your guests and hope to service you all at every event!

name: Keiko Childs
text: We booked Roxxy on the Rocks to host the open bar at our wedding.  The reason we decided to go with them is because their service catered exactly to our needs.  We wanted an affordable bartending service that would provide all mixers, ice, and glasses, but that would allow US to buy the alcohol.  We were able to save so much money by buying our own alcohol.  Jasmine and her assistant were cheerful, sweet, and professional.  I never saw a line at the bar, and I know they were working hard, making drinks, because we didn’t have that much alcohol to bring home at the end of the night.  If you are planning a wedding on a budget, definitely give Jasmine a call.  Jasmine answered all of my emails quickly, courteously, and offered easy Paypal payment options so I didn’t have to worry about mailing checks or anything.  I am so happy that I chose Roxxy on the Rocks!

name: April Carter
text: I loved it me and my husband will dine there again...

name: Vanessa Williams
text: This is the best job I've ever had. It's like family here. The beverages are great, also new things that taste good.

name: Joshua Johnson
text: Got me in the dock 30 min early and out in a hour

name: Janiece Beinke
text: I am boycotting your products due to your stance on Georgia’s voting laws.  Everyone should show a valid ID to vote in any election..  you may refuse to post this.

name: Darin Potts
text: Employee there was great very professional and nice

name: Farhod Rasulov
text: Delivery's

name: Nathan Priddy
text: I worked for ccbcu for almost 2yrs as Warehouse Utility Classic Foods (the vending division). They are an Awesome company to work for, don't misunderstand you will work you but off but they will and do take care of their people.

name: Putu Primanta
text:
Love the staffs here,.....everyone is so nice and helpful.
In and out less than 10 minutes, thank you guys for always helping us.

name: Fronanda Strickland
text: Was in and out in less than an hour...

name: Dereck Summerford
text: I'm night shift production maintenance and it's a good place to work and drink tons of whatever coke product you like.

name: Ben Perkins
text: Same stuff, different day

name: HABRAHA TRUCKING LLC
text: The wisdom is that when your rule  and policy is not applicable in some situations   There should be and exceptional, to solve and simplify the problems, the trailer was full of pallets on top of each other, from the floor to the roof, Nothing to do with the straps to hold it, secondly when the truck backs up to the dock it is coming from the hill to the sharp slope to back up, and the freight it must be filling down, in this scenario, your policy says, if the freight falls down the driver must be collecting it, come on, a driver who was on duty, may be, 14hours to deliver your needs is to be punished, Nope. You have to prepare a safe facility for the public. Me and my drivers won’t be back in to this facility, “Coca-Cola. Birmingham” Thanks

name: Vivian Avila
text: Excellent, very friendly and helpful

name: Tommy Gadson
text: Delivered to this facility on 5/28. I get to the guard shack to leave, I can't pull my door. Inspect it and see that the forklift operator dented in my hinge and broke the door hinge completely. If you deliver her make sure to take photos before going in. I paid almost $240 for the repair. Now no one knows what's going on.

name: reginald alexander
text: Lately things been slow so they get u in /out with no problem but when things kick up...just make sure to grab u something to eat 🤣

name: Delajla Muhamedbegovic
text: Fast before app

name: Damien Carter
text: They're  fast

name: Unknown User
text: Was always a huge fan of the coca cola brand. Also owner of many ties and influences of coke products sold and bought along the gulf coast! Coke United has bought out locations in the area and (to my understanding) has asked that employees lower their wages and allocate more towards health and pension. These are the same employees who have dedicated their working lives to bettering the company, producing, and distributing their products to consumers across the southeast! With millions of dollars worth of improvements planned to facilities, it seems that pre-industrial revolution decision makers wants union members to pay for it. Until the sweat and blood of these workers is compensated for appropriately, I ask that we consumers take a stand, and we get on our feet for the American workforce! End corporate greed!

name: Vishal Tambolkar
text: Always happy to work with Consolidated.. nice people to work with. Easy to locate the place...

name: Michaels Lucky Wife
text: Fast load and unload once you get to the dock

name: William McLean
text:
Coca Cola is always slow, but this one is the worst I've ever been to. To start, they changed the appointment without notifying anyone, for 2 hours later and sent me to an abandoned building to wait. When you check back in, you go to the back of a line to wait for a door (there's only 3 they'll use). It's been 2 hours and I finally made it to the front of the line only to be told to wait because a coca cola truck is coming in and they have precedence over the OTR drivers.

Turn this load down!

text: It's a great place to do business with

name: Wiseone
text: The past owner valued his employees. Long time employees with decades of employment should be treated better.  Don't bother applying for a job, if you have a CDL, go anywhere else.

name: Brain Teaser
text: They gave the COR-production employees ....( wait for it ) .......A  BELL!  and 2 cases of soda for Christmas...while other essential employers are given their employees $ ( bonus ) from $ 150-300.00.    WOW !!!!   and  will ask employees to come in on O-T.  again.... WOW !!!!.

name: Tim Lawson
text: I'll never go back to this facility again!! Checked in at 13:00 and they told me to come back at 1430..ok so I leave and come back at 1430 just to be told that their not loading trucks until 1700!! I'm like what happen to 1430??? So I leave again and come back at 1700 and go to check in and they tell me to park on the curb and we'll come get you!! They finally come tapping on my truck at 1930,got on the dock and sit 2 more hours!! TOTAL WAIT TIME WAS OVER 9 HOURS ...do yourself a favor and find you another load!!

name: Brian Chapman
text:
I'm on a dedicated account loading here daily.  The longest it has ever taken was last night when they lost power due to a failed transformer.  It's usually about a 2 hour load process.
I have NEVER experienced 4.5 hours load,  or unload.

name: Country_ Man 9470
text: I was there to unload and they took their sweet time.

text: Avoid avoid avoid

name: Irish
text: I dropped my load off. They left all kinds of trash in my trailer, then threatened to call the police when i went to throw their garbage in their dumpster

name: Tim is the best Tim is the best

name: Toot LaTrice
text: Prior to 7 a.m. local drivers are loading. This spot is a little tight but doable. Loading/ unloading goes pretty quick once docked. Employees are very nice and helpful.

name: Raymon Villa
text: Don’t show up after 11:00 am they don’t unload you. And they told me come beck 6:30 next morning and then guess what 9:00 am and still here like 7 more semis outside on the street and nothing.. they are just lazy

name: M.D 5486
text:
10 trucks...
1 door..1st come 1st serve

name: Wanda Feliciano
text: Very tight to back up, but I did it. Now to wait to get unloaded. Roadlink truck was blocking me but someone inside said, Move back to give me room to back up. I ask him nicely, but he didn't understand English. 🙄

name: Jerry Griffin
text: Great people to work with. Always working on making sure the loads are right.

name: J.R. Lloyd
text: Easy peasy. Arrived at 8:20am for a 9:00am appointment. Had me in a door by 9:00am and empty by 10:00am.

name: Stacy Ray
text: Street parking for waiting.. hard back but doable.. friendly staff

name: Kuri Mahesh
text: Customer service awful

name: Mike Schmitt
text: Tight spot, but quick unloading

name: Angelo Rogers
text: Doesn't matter about appointments. Apparently its first come first served.

name: J Stone
text: Company will pad your order with products that you neither ordered or authorized.  Complete lack of ethics.

name: Victor Olivas
text: Customer service from receptionist is awful.

name: Terry Fee
text: Slow start, 630 appointment got a door around 800, out at 9.

name: Michael Bell
text: Nice and professional!! Fast in and out service.

name: Ricky Pyles
text:
Nice staff. Dock lay out is retarded. You must park on the street with the no parking signs. Sets appointments for delivery but seems to be fcfs.
Birmingham, Al i20 also made the del harder than it had to be.

name: Eugene Jones
text: Small place but quick unloading once you get a dock door.

name: Javon Taylor
text: This company is HORRIBLE to to drive for. They do not train you correctly then expect you to know what to do on the job by yourself. They will make you work like a slave I totaled up the hours I worked and how much I was paid it eaquled out to 10 dollars an hour. The Human resources lady is a joke says she has an open door policy but her door is closed because she is never there. The ware house never has the trucks loaded on time with in turn makes customers mad at you. Being a driver you will have to put up over a 1000 cases by yourself. They promise a helper will come out but I have never had help. The driver supervisor does not know what he is doing he makes excuses for everything and blames everyone but his self. They will give you a locker you cannot even get a key to. The salesman never do their job as a driver customers will get mad at you for their faults....I was yelled at by customers countless numbers of time. Hey if you don't believe me try it for yourself but don't say I didn't warn you.....💩💩💩💩💩💩💩ty JOB.

name: Eirish
text:
An absolutely horrid company to do business with! Incompetent employees directed by incompetent management. I have had endless headaches when dealing with Gulf Distributing Company of Birmingham. Over the last seven months they have yet to get a single order correct, and worse is their utter refusal to fix mistakes made by their salespeople. I would highly recommend finding another place to invest your time and money, as this business is at best a joke.
Today 6/8/18 I have had yet another issue with this wretched, sorry, excuse for a business. My store switched from using one of their "sales people" to the "telesales" system, to help alleviate headaches. It has not worked..... The delivery drivers are still just as pathetic as every single other person there!! They have managed to break something every single delivery. Of course they don't tell you they did. No! You find the broken product when you move something they hid it with!! Finding unexpected broken glass with bare hands is less than ideal!! You call their, "customer service" (what a joke), only to be yelled at for having a complaint then hung up on. Save your door space for a company that actually works, like Adam's Beverage, or Alabev. The Coors and Miller products aren't worth the disappointment and stitches!! Gulf Distributing Company of Alabama is an unfunny joke!!

name: Michael Hrisca
text: All the negative reviews about this place are accurate. Avoid if you can. Don’t even think to check in before 8am. The upside is that you can sleep on the streets in the area.

name: Tony Dycus
text: I dont know why all the bad reviews.  Yes there is over night parking on the street in front of the warehouse.  Park on the street and check in at 7 am.  They will come out to get you.  They start at 8am appt.   Tight yard but if you know how to back up you'll be fine.  My appt was at 8 am and was in the dock at 8:35 and out the gate at 9:10.  People were cordial and nice.  No problems here.

name: Francisco Reyes
text: No people answer phones in the last 7 days this is the most incompetent company in the USA

name: Crystal Harris
text: Awful place to work! Worked there informed HR of my trip to Africa. Gave a two week notice as instructed by Judy Graham.. After i worked my two-week notice i took my trip to Africa. It was Amazing! I called from Africa and spoke to Susan from HR about my last check. After two months of the Best days of my life, i went in to work. There was new HR, I saw the new HR lady interviewing the same day i spoke to Judy Graham before my two-week notice. The new HR didn't knw the nature of our conversation and so contacted Judy Graham about wether or not i was suppose to return.i found that strange that nothing about me was in system, but I patiently waited. To my Shock and Suprise, Judy Graham claimed she never heard of me before, she said remind me of who you are because i did not know who you are. I said I'm the employee who informed you of my trip to Africa and i came to you and gave my two week notice. She said she worked out of Montgomery and never worked out of the Birmingham location. (But she was there when HR lady Carolyn Lyttle was out because Carolyn left to transfer to another location.) She said since theres no PROOF of me giving a two week notice i was no longer rehireable. I said call Sydney the warehouse manager. They said they let him go! I said call Johnny another manager. He said he did not know what we discussed and nothing was informed to him (lies) so he took a don't get me involved stance. Finally as I'm leaving i said a quiet prayer to myself, just then the new HR woman said i remember you the day i interviewed. She said I don't know why Ms. Graham is denying knowing you, she said but i didn't hear your conversation I jus know i remember you spoke with her while i interviewed. Judy calls as i'm headed out not knowing i hadn't fully left the room! Then i overhear new HR lady say "she's still here". There was a pause. Then she passed the phone to me, Judy Graham basically shouted at me its my fault I didn't put my 2 week notice in writing. I have til this day a letter that we Judy Graham and i corresponded with over something else.(remember she claimed she never heard or knew of me). For her to say she never knew me...well this is the type of stuff we poor black folks on the bottom line have to deal with in a daily basis working in these "right to work states". God has been with me in my journey, my spirit told me to write this. Maybe somebody will take heed before accepting employment here.

name: douglas gulsby
text: Not a good place to unload. I loaded here Monday on a round trip to Louisville. Was told when I left for Louisville that the weather would be bad (snow) when I got back to Bham and to not expect unloading until Thursday. Turns out weather forecast was wrong and I rolled in at 8 am to unload Wednesday per my company instructions. Guy on loading dock got in my face and yelled to me and everyone on the loading dock not to unload me because Louisville didn’t send correct paperwork. My operations manager made some calls and he had an attitude adjustment. It still took 3 hours to get out of there. I’m not going back.

name: William Fisher
text: One assigned dock only took 30 minutes to unload,

name: Robin Johnson
text: Hard backing but good receivers at dock

name: Ralphy mguilacutty
text: Just try calling there number.  Good luck getting return phone calls.  Have been trying for a week!

name: Mike Mascow
text: Good people who unload trucks fast!

name: William Wilkinson
text: Horrible customer service! They will not return calls when you're trying to order from them.

name: T.J. Berryhill
text: I just had a great interview

name: Jerry Griffin
text: Great place to work with.

text: Can’t get ANYONE on the phone and then when you place your order you might get it delivered and you might not! BEEN waiting for over a week and it still hasn’t been delivered!

name: James Hannah
text: Don't do it

name: Roymont Letchaw
text: Good people

name: John Watson

name: laron young
text: I work there so I guess is ok.

name: Mariyan Antov
text: Quick offloading.... drivers just make sure about hours of operation for this company....

name: Donald Mac Rae
text: Buffalo Rock was a pleasure to deliver to. Everyone was helpful and very easy to deal with. The docks can be a little tight depending on which one you get and if there are trailers in the docksnext to yours. I was setting up to back into one of the tight ones and the switcher, without even being asked told me to hold on and went out of his way to move an empty from a door to make it an easy move for me. You don't see that too often! And, I was unlaoded within 45 mins! My experience here was terrific. Wish every place was this way!

name: Shona Barlow
text: Company is not bad. Its the new management.  Tim Elliot is one of the new in house managers besides the new manager above him Eric Kirkpatrick. Tim asked me to out anybody that was bad mouthing him behind closed doors and called some of the pickers lazy workers. He's older so he communicated a lot of things that either weren't happening or things that were going to change too soon. The new managers placed him in the division warehouse manager pos before a manager that had been there 10years prior and more qualified but I guess that's how it goes huh? The new management is sneaky. They will smile in your face and have you write up for something you were never coached about. They have no policy, they create is as events happen and that's poor management for this Huntsville, AL Division.

name: dean odom
text: Great people quick unload

name: Victor Davidson
text: Receiver was nice and they offloaded me fast.

name: Charles Coan

name: Eric Motley
text: Awful place to work. No advancement opportunities and ungrateful management. Was there 16 years. Coke is better.

text: If these guys is working slower is going to be going backwards I cannot believe it people can find a job and working like that 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼🐌🐌🐌

name: Mike Presson
text: Great place to load. Very nice people and friendly. Thanks guys for the quick service 👍

name: C Porter
text: I've been  Enjoying There coffee's for years.

name: Walter Hernandez
text: It's a good place to work for. Friendly environment and they  care for everyone.

name: Easton Lynn
text: They offer a great variety of fresh food. I love dining here. The employees are always super friendly, prices are affordable and the place is always clean.

name: Douglas Adams
text: This spot is great! Good prices, large dishes and the staff members are regularly super nice.

name: Nilipour Oriental Rugs
text: My family and I are thankful to Mr. and Mrs. Smith of Royal Cup Coffee Co.!  We have enjoyed our mornings so much more now that have been introduced to some of the finest coffees!  What a treat to wake up to such a wonderfully bold aroma and it goes down so smooth!  Thank you for being such a landmark to Birmingham, AL!

name: CJ Britton
text: Royal Cup is easily one of the best places I've had the pleasure to work at. While we serve (the best) coffee and tea nationwide I will proudly say that the company does everything it can to serve its people first. While it is a tired HR trope to say this, at Royal Cup is it so true. Here you're not an employee, you're family.

name: Dan Micoley
text: Nice people but takes more time to figure put where your load gos than to unload,  And that's not very fast either.

name: Marcus Kirby
text: I am a business partner of Royal Cup, and have found them to be very friendly and professional. They are some of my favorite folks to work with.

name: Brian Chapman
text:
Great experience  ! Nice folks,  and  had an appointment for the next morning,  and  they unloaded me early.
About an hour opening to closing doors.

name: Jon Biancardi
text: Royal Cup offers exceptionally smooth coffees and flavorful teas as well as instills a customer-centric approach through sales, service, and customized beverage programs.

name: paquiao manuel
text: just trying to make a delivery.. nobody knows who is receiving the load...they have several warehouses..2 hours spend driving back and forth

name: Abdelhamed Hasan
text:
Amazing people with amazing attitudes
I love this place,,, in and out in 1 hour

name: Jason Letcher
text: The amazing Aroma of fresh-brewed coffee.

name: Dakota Nichols
text: Great coffee (and tea), great customer service, and great for the city of Birmingham!

name: Jason Mydland
text: Awesome people! Great Coffee.

name: Birdivender Singh Birring
text: Slow very very slow unloading  never ever coming again 😡😡😡😡

name: John Johnson
text: Great company!!!

name: Jonathan Brantley
text: Awesome place

name: Debbie Boles
text: great tasting coffee

name: Mark Pouncey
text: Great place to work!!!

name: Rebecca Victory
text: great coffee!!

name: Kevin Spurlin
text: I wish they sold it in stores!

name: Dmitry Kucher
text:
(Translated by Google) Very long unloading. You need to ring the doorbell and wait half an hour until someone comes and opens the door.

(Original)
Очень долгая разгрузка. Нужно позвонить в звонок на двери и ждать полчаса пока кто-то придет и окроет двери.

name: Geovanny Angeles
text:
(Translated by Google) It is a nice and beautiful place

(Original)
Es un lugar lindo y hermoso
